pr_title: Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't seem okay to me. That name is string matched against the page contents. You shouldn't change it.
timeline.author: TheAssassin

replies.bodyText: No, that name is not string-matched anywhere. It is only used as the name of the JS function that is manually built to then call the other functions inside the player's JS.
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.author: TheAssassin

replies.bodyText: Oh, yes, this is not only used for restricted videos anymore
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: Same as above. Pretty sure you may not change this. However, you should consider extracting it into a global constant, too.
timeline.author: TheAssassin

replies.bodyText: "deobfuscationCode" is only the name of the JS file to be interpreted, which could be anything and for us has no effect whatsoever on code execution
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.author: TheAssassin

timeline.message: Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message
Remove any reference to decrypt and improve error message
